title: Auto Accident: How do I deal with a demand that vastly exceeds my insurance policy?
question: My wife was in an auto accident, and it was determined she was at fault. There were no drugs / alcohol involved. We received a demand letter for $150,000. Our coverage is only for $100,000. I do not have the means to pay the additional $50,000.
answers: Bankruptcy may be an option for you to consider. Your wife may be able to discharge this claim in a bankruptcy case. I suggest you consult with a local and experienced bankruptcy attorney.
Bankruptcy may indeed be your best course of action. I suggest that you consult with a bankruptcy attorney to review your options.
